dct_title_s: State and Province Boundaries for Minor Islands with Scale Ranking, 1:10 million (2012)
dct_description_sm: This polygon shapefile depicts internal, first-order administrative boundaries and polygons for minor islands less than 2 sq. km. or less in size. Use the following selection statement to derive this theme from the 10m lakes: “ScaleRank” <=2. This layer is part of the Natural Earth Collection (v.2.0.0). These data are represented at 1:10,000,000 scale.

Natural Earth is a public domain map dataset available at 1:10, 1:50 and 1:110 million scales. Featuring tightly integrated vector and raster data, with Natural Earth you can make a variety of visually pleasing, well-crafted maps with cartography or GIS software.
dct_rights_sm: This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: This work is in the Public Domain, meaning that it is not subject to copyright.
